full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIGS DRUG GNAS SBYONG GI DMIGS BSKOR NGAG 'DON GYI RIM PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RIGS DRUG GNAS SBYONG GI DMIGS BSKOR NGAG 'DON GYI RIM PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES SER PRA DHI DGE BSHES ZUR PA BSKAL BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^RVA BSGRING NO MON HAN GYI SA SER THEG CHEN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DZA YANTU, MANGGA LAm, ,)
